div.p:
How to Make Your Own Face Covering
Dr. Jerome Adams, U.S. Surgeon General
Oak Park Schools utilizes the School Messenger system to deliver text messages, directly to your mobile phone with important information about events, school closures, safety alerts and more.
You can receive real-time updates and relevant information on a variety of school district-related topics through our text message service. Messages and data may apply.
You can participate in this service by sending a text message of "Y" or "Yes" to our school district's short code number, 67587.
You can also opt out of these messages at any time by replying "Stop" to one of our text messages.
OPS has a phone hotline that will become active in the event that schools are closed. 248-336-7607.
Signage on the Administration Building Bulletin Board, located at 13900 Granzon Oak Park, MI 48237.
Updates will be shared in the local media on channels 2, 4, and 7 and Cable Channel 17.
Updates will be available on our district website, School Messenger, Twitter and Facebook accounts.

Proper Hand Washing
Dr. Sanja Gupta, CNN
